casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. DEMATTEO
v.
STATE TEACHERS RETIREMENT SYS. 2018-1531 Supreme Court of Ohio. December 18, 2018

MEDIATION MATTER

Pursuant to R.C. 2710.06(B)(1), the court has been notified that the parties in the case has reached a settlement. The case is returned to the regular docket under S.Ct. Prac.R. 19.01. Within 60 days, the appellants shall file either an application for dismissal or a merit brief in accordance with the Supreme

Court Rules of Practice. The case will be dismissed for want of prosecution if an application for dismissal or a merit brief is not filed within 60 days.
